vstore.framework.communication.master_node

Class MasterNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • vstore.framework.communication.master_node.MasterNode

  • public class MasterNode
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides simple calls for communicating with the master node. The methods should be called from an own thread, or else the call will block the current thread, since it involves network operations.
